_sText:
Twoflats - Bomb/Defuse


CT's: The T's are trying to destroy you're base. The've
already taken one of your 2 flats. You must prevent the 
T's for destroying your other building!

T's: You've taken possession of one of the 2 flats where
the CT's spend the nights. You've got to destroy the
other one and prevent them to become stronger and better.
When you blew up their other flat, victory will be yours!


Note: There are 2 bomb targets in the mission.



Map contrived by Jeroen Francot *Popper* and Mark de Vet *Hellblazer*


Map made by Mark de Vet *Hellblazer*
